trans-unit.source: Represents a cached data object in a document-level customization that was created by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 表示文档级自定义中的缓存数据对象，该文档级自定义通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建。

trans-unit.source: For more information about caching data in document-level customizations, see [Caching Data](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md) and [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关在文档级自定义项中缓存数据的详细信息，请参阅[缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/caching-data.md)和[访问的服务器上的文档数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example examines each <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem> in the data cache of an Excel workbook and displays the name of each cached data object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例检查每个<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem>Excel 工作簿，并在显示的数据缓存中的每个名称缓存数据对象。

trans-unit.source: This example requires:
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要：

trans-unit.source: A console application project or some other non-Office project.
trans-unit.target: 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: References to the following assemblies:
trans-unit.target: 对以下程序集的引用：

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll

trans-unit.source: `Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName> namespaces at the top of your code file.
trans-unit.target: `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName>代码文件顶部的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the assembly-qualified name of the type of the cached data object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置缓存数据对象类型的程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: The assembly-qualified name of the type of the cached data object.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的数据对象的类型的程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.DataType%2A> property returns an assembly-qualified name of the cached data type that is useful for creating a new instance of a custom type that is in the data cache.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.DataType%2A>属性返回可用于创建自定义类型的新实例存在于数据缓存的缓存的数据类型的程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can get the <xref:System.Type> of a custom data type by passing the assembly-qualified type name to the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以获得<xref:System.Type>通过将传递到的程序集限定类型名称的自定义数据类型<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can then create an instance of the custom type by passing this <xref:System.Type> as a parameter to the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以然后创建自定义类型的实例，通过将此传递<xref:System.Type>作为参数传递给<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。

trans-unit.source: For details about the format of the assembly-qualified type string that is returned by the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.DataType%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 返回的程序集限定类型字符串的格式有关的详细信息<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.DataType%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A> method to modify the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A>方法可以修改的字符串的缓存的 Excel 工作簿的工作表中的值。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.DataType%2A> property to verify that the cached data object is a string before trying to modify it.
trans-unit.target: 该代码使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.DataType%2A>属性以验证缓存的数据对象，在尝试对其进行修改之前是字符串。

trans-unit.source: This example requires:
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要：

trans-unit.source: A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`.
trans-unit.target: 具有的 Excel 的文档级自定义项`Sheet1`类`ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间，和中的缓存的字符串`Sheet1`类名为`CachedString`。

trans-unit.source: A console application project or some other non-Office project.
trans-unit.target: 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: References to the following assemblies:
trans-unit.target: 对以下程序集的引用：

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll

trans-unit.source: `Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName> namespaces at the top of your code file.
trans-unit.target: `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName>代码文件顶部的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the cached data object that is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置通过 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> 表示的缓存数据对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the cached data object that is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataHostItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 由缓存的数据对象的名称<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataHostItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Id%2A> property to display the names of the cached data objects in an Excel workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Id%2A>属性要在 Excel 工作簿中显示的缓存的数据对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example requires:
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要：

trans-unit.source: A console application project or some other non-Office project.
trans-unit.target: 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: References to the following assemblies:
trans-unit.target: 对以下程序集的引用：

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll

trans-unit.source: `Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName> namespaces at the top of your code file.
trans-unit.target: `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName>代码文件顶部的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a schema that describes the cached data object that is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />, if the cached data object is a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存数据对象为 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />，获取或设置描述由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> 表示的缓存数据对象的架构。

trans-unit.source: If the cached data object is a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />, this property returns a schema that describes the cached data object; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存的数据对象是<see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" />或<see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />，此属性返回的架构，用于描述缓存的数据对象中; 否则为<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Schema%2A> property, see [ServerDocument Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4d5a9093-d648-4c66-a182-65bebf6016d7).
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例演示如何使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Schema%2A>属性，请参阅[ServerDocument 示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4d5a9093-d648-4c66-a182-65bebf6016d7)。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the data you want to save to an object in the data cache.
trans-unit.target: 该对象包含要保存到数据缓存中的对象的数据。

trans-unit.source: Serializes data to the cached data object that is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 将数据序列化为通过 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> 表示的缓存数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A> method to initialize or modify the value of a cached data object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A>方法以初始化或修改缓存的数据对象的值。

trans-unit.source: This method serializes the `value` parameter into the cached data object that the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem> represents.
trans-unit.target: 此方法序列化`value`到缓存的数据的参数对象<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem>表示。

trans-unit.source: To make changes to specific data values in a complex cached data object, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, deserialize the XML representation of the cached data into a new instance of the cached object, make the changes to this copy, and then use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A> method to serialize the changes back into the data cache.
trans-unit.target: 如对复杂的缓存的数据对象中的特定数据值进行更改<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>反序列化的 XML 表示形式的缓存数据到缓存的对象的新实例，对此副本进行更改，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A>方法要序列化所做的更改回数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md) and [Walkthrough: Changing Cached Data in a Workbook on a Server](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问的服务器上的文档数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md)和[演练： 更改服务器上的工作簿中的缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the DiffGram format for serializing <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and typed dataset objects into the data cache.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于序列化使用 DiffGram 格式<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable>，并键入到数据缓存的数据集对象。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that changes to the data cache in an offline document are sent to the server correctly.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保对数据缓存对脱机文档中的更改正确发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A> method to modify the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A>方法可以修改的字符串的缓存的 Excel 工作簿的工作表中的值。

trans-unit.source: This example requires:
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要：

trans-unit.source: A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`.
trans-unit.target: 具有的 Excel 的文档级自定义项`Sheet1`类`ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间，和中的缓存的字符串`Sheet1`类名为`CachedString`。

trans-unit.source: A console application project or some other non-Office project.
trans-unit.target: 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: References to the following assemblies:
trans-unit.target: 对以下程序集的引用：

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll

trans-unit.source: `Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName> namespaces at the top of your code file.
trans-unit.target: `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName>代码文件顶部的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML representation of the cached data object that is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> 表示的缓存数据对象的 XML 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the cached data object that is represented by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />.
trans-unit.target: XML 表示形式表示的缓存的数据对象<see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />。

trans-unit.source: To get the value of a cached data object, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Xml%2A> property to deserialize the XML representation of the cached data into a new instance of the cached data object.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的缓存的数据对象的值，请使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Xml%2A>属性进行反序列化的 XML 表示形式的缓存数据到缓存的数据对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You can then make changes to this copy and serialize the changes back into the data cache.
trans-unit.target: 可以对此副本进行更改，随后可序列化回数据缓存的更改。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, you can use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A> method to serialize the changed object into the data cache.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，你可以使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.SerializeDataInstance%2A>方法已更改的对象序列化为数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform your own serialization for changes to cached data, you can also write directly to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Xml%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要对缓存的数据的更改执行你自己的序列化，你还可以编写直接<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Xml%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are making changes to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, or a typed dataset that will be updated to a database by using a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter>, specify the DiffGram format when you write the changes to the cached data.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你更改到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>， <xref:System.Data.DataTable>，或将通过更新到数据库的类型化数据集<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter>，将更改写入缓存的数据时指定 DiffGram 格式。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> will be added to the database as new rows instead of changed rows.
trans-unit.target: 否则为对更改<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>将作为新行，而不是已更改的行添加到数据库。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessing Data in Documents on the Server](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问的服务器上的文档数据](/visualstudio/vsto/accessing-data-in-documents-on-the-server.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Xml%2A> property to get the value of a string that is cached in a worksheet of an Excel workbook.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Xml%2A>属性来获取缓存的 Excel 工作簿的工作表中的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: The example displays the value in a message box.
trans-unit.target: 该示例在一个消息框中显示的值。

trans-unit.source: This example requires:
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要：

trans-unit.source: A document-level customization for Excel that has a `Sheet1` class in the `ExcelWorkbook1` namespace, and a cached string in the `Sheet1` class named `CachedString`.
trans-unit.target: 具有的 Excel 的文档级自定义项`Sheet1`类`ExcelWorkbook1`命名空间，和中的缓存的字符串`Sheet1`类名为`CachedString`。

trans-unit.source: A console application project or some other non-Office project.
trans-unit.target: 控制台应用程序项目或某些其他非 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: References to the following assemblies:
trans-unit.target: 对以下程序集的引用：

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.ServerDocument.dll

trans-unit.source: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll
trans-unit.target: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime.dll

trans-unit.source: `Imports` (for Visual Basic) or `using` (for C#) statements for <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName> namespaces at the top of your code file.
trans-unit.target: `Imports` （对于 Visual Basic) 或`using`（对于 C#) 语句<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.Runtime?displayProperty=fullName>代码文件顶部的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates how to use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Xml%2A> property to modify and serialize changes to a cached <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, see [Walkthrough: Changing Cached Data in a Workbook on a Server](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例演示如何使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem.Xml%2A>属性来修改和序列化对缓存更改<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，请参阅[演练： 更改服务器上的工作簿中的缓存数据](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-changing-cached-data-in-a-workbook-on-a-server.md)。
